data.system_settings: Kubuntu 16.04, Discord Canary / Android 4.4.2, Discord Alpha v3.6.5
data.actual_result: Discord client on PC switches to your new server & joins voice
data.expected_result: Mobile app connects to voice channel
data.short_description: Automatically connected to voice channel on PC when creating server on android
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord on your computer - Create a server on your mobile device
